solution_line_template: If Gladys will be {gladys_future_age} years old {years_to_subtract_L1} years from now, she is {gladys_future_age}-{years_to_subtract_L1}= <<{gladys_future_age}-{years_to_subtract_L1}={gladys_current_age}>>{gladys_current_age} years old currently.

Juanico is {juanico_age_less} years less than half the age of Gladys, meaning he is {juanico_age_less} years younger than {half_numerator}/{half_denominator}*{gladys_current_age} = {half_gladys_age} years.
Juanico's age {years_to_add_L4} years from now will be {years_to_add_L4}+{juanico_current_age} = <<{years_to_add_L4}+{juanico_current_age}={juanico_future_age}>>{juanico_future_age} years.
